title: Drawing, Design for Serving Table of Mahogany with Ball and Claw Feet, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Serving Table of Mahogany with Ball and Claw Feet
markings: Watermark across verso bottom : ORIENTAL LINEN
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and red ink, center below image: Mahogany V=[box with dot in middle]X, and along left edge and at upper center of image, numerical notations indicating dimensions
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular table top with 2 drawers at front and conforming lower shelf; raised on 4 bracket-shaped straight legs terminating in scrolling ball and claw feet with acanthus leaf motifs at tops; backsplash.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Serving Table of Mahogany with Ball and Claw Feet, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-69
